page.title: 10 SHOPPING ON WOOSEHILL
page.content: On Friday 28th June we interviewed the manager of{SAFEWAYS SUPERMARKET.}He is 29,married with two sons,he moved from Warminster.He enjoys living on Woosehill and finds it very convenient.The store occupies a 30,000 sq. foot site and sells a huge range of goods:but there are no plans to include toys or clothes,these are not profitable lines.He would like to have a cafe but hasn't room,the store employs 132 people.The car park(also 30,000 sq. feet)is soon to be twice as big because most cutomers shop by car weekly.Shoplifting is a problem commited by all age groups.He dislikes the office block built in front of the store but likes the doctors surgery which brings people to use the pharmacy department.
